Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Plot: A documentary crew arrives at the offices of Dunder Mifflin to observe the employees and learn about modern management. Manager Michael Scott tries to paint a happy picture, while sales rep Jim fights with his nemesis Dwight and flirts with receptionist Pam.
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.GuestStars: Melora Hardin, David Denman, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Leslie David Baker, Oscar Nuñez, Phyllis Smith, Henriette Mantel, Mike McCaul

Episodes.Title: Diversity Day
Episodes.Plot: A consultant arrives to teach the staff about tolerance and diversity but Michael insists on imparting his own knowledge. Meanwhile, Jim struggles to keep hold of a lucrative contract extension.
Episodes.GuestStars: Larry Wilmore, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Kate Flannery, Leslie David Baker, Mindy Kaling, Oscar Nuñez, Paul Lieberstein, Phyllis Smith

Episodes.Title: Health Care
Episodes.Plot: Michael doesn't want to upset the staff so he gets Dwight to pass on news about the company's reduced health provisions. Fed up with his nosiness, Jim and Pam pretend they are suffering from a variety of conditions including Ebola, Mad Cow Disease, spontaneous dentohydroplosion, hotdog fingers, nano-robot infection, inverted penis and anal fissures.
Episodes.GuestStars: Melora Hardin, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Kate Flannery, Leslie David Baker, Mindy Kaling, Oscar Nuñez, Paul Lieberstein, Phyllis Smith, Charlie Hartsock

Episodes.Title: The Alliance
Episodes.Plot: Michael arranges a morale-boosting birthday party for Meredith and is determined to come up with the funniest message in her card. Dwight wants a pact with Jim to fight the downsizing, and Michael regrets showing off when Oscar asks for sponsorship for a charity walk being undertaken by his nephew, who has cerebral palsy.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Denman, Craig Robinson, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Kate Flannery, Leslie David Baker, Oscar Nuñez, Paul Lieberstein, Phyllis Smith

Episodes.Title: Basketball
Episodes.Plot: The office staff play a basketball game against the warehouse workers in which Jim shows off to impress Pam and upstage her fiancee who is on the opposing team.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Denman, Patrice O'Neal, Craig Robinson, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Karly Rothenberg, Kate Flannery, Leslie David Baker, Oscar Nuñez, Phyllis Smith, Matt Decaro

Episodes.Title: Hot Girl
Episodes.Plot: A woman who comes to the office to sell purses gets the male members of staff excited. She rejects Dwight's advances, but Michael reckons he's still in with a chance.
Episodes.GuestStars: Amy Adams, David Denman, Melora Hardin, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Kate Flannery, Leslie David Baker, Oscar Nuñez,  Paul Lieberstein, Phyllis Smith
